title: Epic Seven Tier List
description: This is a tier list of the best characters in Epic Seven. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. The best characters are in S Tier, and the worst characters are in C Tier. The list is based on the characters performance in both PvE and PvP. Please note that this is just a general tier list, and the best characters for you will depend on your playstyle and team composition.
heading: Epic Seven Tier List
introText: This is a tier list of the best characters in Epic Seven. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. The best characters are in S Tier, and the worst characters are in C Tier. The list is based on the characters performance in both PvE and PvP. Please note that this is just a general tier list, and the best characters for you will depend on your playstyle and team composition.

data.itemDescription: The fastest farmer in the game, and still a viable PvP unit
A powerful nuker who can one-shot most units with the right gear
A versatile bruiser who can tank and deal damage
A strong defense breaker who can also deal good damage
A great all-around unit who can be used in both PvE and PvP
A powerful healer and cleanser who is essential for many teams
A strong AoE nuker who can also heal herself and her allies
A powerful single-target nuker who can also strip buffs
A versatile unit who can be used as a bruiser, nuker, or debuffer
A powerful support unit who can provide buffs, debuffs, and healing
A strong AoE nuker who is especially effective against Water units
